Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are talking about Australia's upcoming Federal Budget and it seems like the government has a tough time on its hands. The articles discuss the need to curb inflation and increase social housing to help combat the housing affordability crisis among other things. People are buzzing about whether interest rates will further drop and student accommodation leaders have put together a billion-dollar-plus build-to-rent fund. Perhaps most notably doctors are calling for a sugar tax to reduce consumer demand for unhealthy drinks.
